name: Monthly Student Progress Report
report_script:
__import__ frappe
from datetime __import__ datetime, timedelta

def execute(filters=None):
    columns, data = get_columns(), get_data(filters)
    return columns, data

def get_columns():
    return [
        {"fieldname": "student_name", "label": "Student Name", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 200},
        {"fieldname": "progress_status", "label": "Progress Status", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 150},
        {"fieldname": "report_date", "label": "Report Date", "fieldtype": "Date", "width": 100},
    ]

def get_data(filters):
    today = datetime.today()
    last_month = today - timedelta(days=30)
    progress_reports = frappe.db.sql("""
        SELECT student, status, report_date 
        FROM `tabProgress Report`
        WHERE report_date BETWEEN %s AND %s
    """, (last_month, today), as_dict=True)

    data = []
    for report in progress_reports:
        data.append({
            "student_name": report.student,
            "progress_status": report.status,
            "report_date": report.report_date
        })
    return data
